verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w right|strong="H6664"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w attend|strong="H7181"\w* unto my \w cry|strong="H7440"\w*, give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* unto my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \add that goeth\add* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* out of \w feigned|strong="H4820"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.\f + \fr 17.1 \ft the right: Heb. justice\f*\f + \fr 17.1 \ft not…: Heb. without lips of deceit\f*

Let my \w sentence|strong="H4941"\w* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*; let thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w behold|strong="H2372"\w* the things that are \w equal|strong="H4339"\w*.

Thou hast \w proved|strong="H0974"\w* mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; thou hast \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* \add me\add* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; thou hast \w tried|strong="H6884"\w* me, \add and\add* shalt \w find|strong="H4672"\w* nothing; I am \w purposed|strong="H2161"\w* \add that\add* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* shall not \w transgress|strong="H5674"\w*.

Concerning the \w works|strong="H6468"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* I have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \add me from\add* the \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* of the \w destroyer|strong="H6530"\w*.

Hold \w up|strong="H8551"\w* my \w goings|strong="H0838"\w* in thy \w paths|strong="H4570"\w*, \add that\add* my \w footsteps|strong="H6471"\w* \w slip|strong="H4131"\w* not.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft slip…: Heb. be not moved\f*

I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon thee, for thou wilt \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* me, O \w God|strong="H0410"\w*: \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto me, \add  \+w and hear|strong="H8085"\+w*\add* my \w speech|strong="H0565"\w*.

Shew thy \w marvellous|strong="H6395"\w* \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w*, O thou that \w savest|strong="H3467"\w* by thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* them which put their \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* \add in thee\add* from those that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \add against them\add*.\f + \fr 17.7 \ft by thy…: or, them which trust in thee from those that rise up against thy right hand\f*
\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* me as the \w apple|strong="H0380"\w* of the \w eye|strong="H1323"\w*, \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* me under the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of thy \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*,

\w From|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w that|strong="H2098"\w* \w oppress|strong="H7703"\w* me, \add from\add* my \w deadly|strong="H5315"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \add who\add* compass me \w about|strong="H5362"\w*.\f + \fr 17.9 \ft oppress: Heb. waste\f*\f + \fr 17.9 \ft my…: Heb. my enemies against the soul\f*
They are \w inclosed|strong="H5462"\w* in their own \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*: with their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w proudly|strong="H1348"\w*.

They have now \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* us in our \w steps|strong="H0838"\w*: they have \w set|strong="H7896"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* bowing \w down|strong="H5186"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

\w Like|strong="H1825"\w* as a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \add that\add* is \w greedy|strong="H3700"\w* of his \w prey|strong="H2963"\w*, and as it were a young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* \w lurking|strong="H3427"\w* in secret \w places|strong="H4565"\w*.\f + \fr 17.12 \ft Like…: Heb. The likeness of him (that is, of every one of them) is as a lion that desireth to ravin\f*\f + \fr 17.12 \ft lurking: Heb. sitting\f*

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w disappoint|strong="H6923"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, cast him \w down|strong="H3766"\w*: \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \add which is\add* thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*:\f + \fr 17.13 \ft disappoint…: Heb. prevent his face\f*\f + \fr 17.13 \ft which is: or, by\f*

From \w men|strong="H4962"\w* \add which are\add* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, from \w men|strong="H4962"\w* of the \w world|strong="H2465"\w*, \add which have\add* their \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* in \add this\add* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, and whose \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* thou \w fillest|strong="H4390"\w* with thy \w hid|strong="H6840"\w* \add treasure:\add* they are \w full|strong="H7646"\w* of \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of their \add substance\add* to their \w babes|strong="H5768"\w*.\f + \fr 17.14 \ft which are: or, by\f*\f + \fr 17.14 \ft they…: or, their children are full\f*

As for me, I will \w behold|strong="H2372"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: I shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*, when I \w awake|strong="H6974"\w*, with thy \w likeness|strong="H8544"\w*.
